title: Yui Shop
description: Four full-color pages of sexy, cute and stylish young ladies will get you going in each installment of "YUI SHOP." There's Makoto, a stunning beauty who will excite you gracefully with her sexy yukata when she goes out at night to a summer festival. Watch Kazumi walk topless on the beach as she is secretly photographed. Later her boyfriend will dress her in erotic swimwear and fondle her before your very eyes! Meet Yuri, who has one face for day and another for night. Packed with gorgeous girls of every imaginable type who will arouse you and excite you in rich, virtual erotica. Yui Toshiki uses state-of-the-art CG techniques.

matches.title: Kanojo ga suru Futokute Katai Mono
Girls and the King's Tea Party
